TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Application extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供 方法和属性以管理应用程序，例如启动和停止应用程序、处理 Windows 消息的方法和获取应用程序信息的属性。

span.span: Provides methods and properties to manage an application, such as methods to start and stop an application, to process Windows messages, and properties to get information about an application.

summary.span: 此类不能被继承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类具有方法用于启动和停止应用程序和线程，并处理 Windows 消息，如下所示：The class has methods to start and stop applications and threads, and to process Windows messages, as follows: - 在当前线程上启动应用程序消息循环和 （可选） 使窗体可见。 starts an application message loop on the current thread and, optionally, makes a form visible. - 或停止消息循环。 or stops a message loop. - 你的程序时在循环中处理消息。 processes messages while your program is in a loop. - 将消息筛选器添加到应用程序消息泵来监视 Windows 消息。 adds a message filter to the application message pump to monitor Windows messages. - 允许您停止来自引发的事件或在调用事件处理程序之前执行特殊操作。 lets you stop an event from being raised or perform special operations before invoking an event handler. 此类具有和属性要获取或设置区域性当前线程的信息。This class has and properties to get or set culture information for the current thread. 无法创建此类的实例。You cannot create an instance of this class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例列出窗体上一个列表框中的数字。The following code example lists numbers in a list box on a form. 每次你单击`button1`，应用程序列表中添加另一个数。Each time you click `button1`, the application adds another number to the list. `Main`方法调用启动该应用程序，这将创建窗体，`listBox1`和`button1`。The `Main` method calls to start the application, which creates the form, `listBox1` and `button1`. 当用户单击`button1`、`button1_Click`方法显示。When the user clicks `button1`, the `button1_Click` method displays a . 如果用户单击`No`上、`button1_Click`方法向列表添加一个数字。If the user clicks `No` on the , the `button1_Click` method adds a number to the list. 如果用户单击`Yes`，应用程序调用来处理队列中的所有剩余消息，然后退出。If the user clicks `Yes`, the application calls to process all remaining messages in the queue and then to quit. > [!NOTE] > 调用在部分信任环境中将失败。The call to will fail in partial trust. [!code-cpp[Classic Application Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Application Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Application Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 添加消息筛选器以便在向目标传送 Windows 消息时监视这些消息。

span.span: Adds a message filter to monitor Windows messages as they are routed to their destinations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要防止引发特定事件或执行特殊操作事件传递到事件处理程序前，请使用消息筛选器。Use a message filter to prevent specific events from being raised or to perform special operations for an event before it is passed to an event handler. 消息筛选器是唯一的特定线程。Message filters are unique to a specific thread. 若要防止消息被调度，`value`将传递给此方法的参数实例必须重写方法替换为代码来处理该消息。To prevent a message from being dispatched, the `value` parameter instance that you pass to this method must override the method with the code to handle the message. 该方法必须返回 `false`。The method must return `false`. > [!CAUTION] > 将消息筛选器添加到应用程序的消息泵会降低性能。Adding message filters to the message pump for an application can degrade performance. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建消息筛选器调用`TestMessageFilter`。The following code example creates a message filter called `TestMessageFilter`. 此筛选器会阻止与鼠标左键相关的所有消息。This filter blocks all messages relating to the left mouse button. 你可以使用消息筛选器之前，必须提供的实现接口。Before you can use a message filter, you must provide an implementation for the interface. [!code-cpp[Classic Application.RemoveMessageFilter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application.RemoveMessageFilter Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Application.RemoveMessageFilter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application.RemoveMessageFilter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Application.RemoveMessageFilter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application.RemoveMessageFilter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回`false`如果从调用在 Web 浏览器内承载。This property returns `false` if it is called from a being hosted within a Web browser. 因此，无法退出。Thus, the cannot quit the .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event ApplicationExit As EventHandler

summary.span: 在应用程序即将关闭时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the application is about to shut down.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须将附加到的事件处理程序事件以执行未经处理，所需任务的应用程序停止运行前。You must attach the event handlers to the event to perform unhandled, required tasks before the application stops running. 你可以关闭打开的此应用程序或释放的垃圾回收未回收的对象文件。You can close files opened by this application, or dispose of objects that garbage collection did not reclaim. 由于这是一个静态事件，则必须分离附加到此事件中任何事件处理程序本身的事件处理程序。Because this is a static event, you must detach any event handlers attached to this event in the event handler itself. 如果未分离这些处理程序，它们将保留附加在该事件，继续占用的内存。If you do not detach these handlers, they will remain attached to the event and continue to consume memory. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示两个窗体，并退出应用程序，这两个窗体关闭时。The following code example displays two forms and exits the application when both forms are closed. 当应用程序启动和退出时，将记住每个窗体的位置。When the application starts and exits, the position of each form is remembered. 此示例演示如何使用事件，以了解在窗体位置应保存到文件，以及时`FileStream`应关闭。This example demonstrates using the event to know when the form positions should be persisted to the file, and when the `FileStream` should be closed. 类`MyApplicationContext`继承自和跟踪时每个窗体已关闭，并在它们都时退出当前线程。The class `MyApplicationContext` inherits from and keeps track of when each form is closed, and exits the current thread when they both are. 关闭时，该类会记住每个窗体的位置。The class remembers the position of each form when it is closed. 当事件发生时，类将写入文件的每个用户的位置。When the event occurs, the class writes the positions of each for the user to the file. 窗体位置数据存储在文件标题为`appdata.txt`，它在由位置创建。The form position data is stored in a file titled `appdata.txt` that is created in the location determined by . `Main`方法调用`Application.Run(context)`启动应用程序提供。The `Main` method calls `Application.Run(context)` to start the application given the . 此代码摘自中所示的示例类概述。This code is an excerpt from the example shown in the class overview. 请参阅为完整的代码清单。See for the whole code listing. [!code-cpp[Application#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Application/CPP/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[Application#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Application/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Application#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Application/VB/source.vb#5)]

value.span: 所有用户共享的应用程序数据的路径。

span.span: The path for the application data that is shared among all users.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果路径不存在，将创建一个采用以下格式：If a path does not exist, one is created in the following format: *基路径*\\\\\\*Base Path*\\\\\\ 第一个如下所示，以查看是否有包含主可执行文件的程序集`AssemblyInformationalVersion`在其上的属性。 first looks to see if the assembly containing the main executable has the `AssemblyInformationalVersion` attribute on it. 如果存在此属性，它同时用于和。If this attribute exists, it is used for both and . 如果此属性不存在，这两个属性使用的可执行文件的版本。If this attribute does not exist, both properties use the version of the executable file instead. 则路径将会不同，具体取决于是否使用部署 Windows 窗体应用程序[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]。The path will be different depending on whether the Windows Forms application is deployed using [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]. [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 应用程序存储在每个用户应用程序缓存中 C:\Documents and Settings\\*用户名*目录。 applications are stored in a per-user application cache in the C:\Documents and Settings\\*username* directory. 有关详细信息，请参阅[访问本地数据和 ClickOnce 应用程序中的远程数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be5cbe12-6cb6-49c9-aa59-a1624e1eef3d)。For more information, see [Accessing Local and Remote Data in ClickOnce Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be5cbe12-6cb6-49c9-aa59-a1624e1eef3d).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void DoEvents() cil managed

summary.span: 处理当前在消息队列中的所有 Windows 消息。

span.span: Processes all Windows messages currently in the message queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 运行 Windows 窗体时，它会创建新的表单，然后等待事件处理。When you run a Windows Form, it creates the new form, which then waits for events to handle. 在每次窗体处理事件，它将处理所有与该事件关联的代码。Each time the form handles an event, it processes all the code associated with that event. 在队列中等待所有其他事件。All other events wait in the queue. 而你的代码来处理该事件，你的应用程序未响应。While your code handles the event, your application does not respond. 例如，如果另一个窗口拖到顶部，也无法重新绘制窗口。For example, the window does not repaint if another window is dragged on top. 如果调用在代码中，你的应用程序可以处理其他事件。If you call in your code, your application can handle the other events. 例如，如果你拥有将数据添加到窗体并添加到代码中，你的窗体可重新绘制在另一个窗口拖到它。For example, if you have a form that adds data to a and add to your code, your form repaints when another window is dragged over it. 如果你删除从代码中，你的窗体不会重新绘制按钮的 click 事件处理程序完成之前执行。If you remove from your code, your form will not repaint until the click event handler of the button is finished executing. 有关消息传送的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体中的用户输入](~/docs/framework/winforms/user-input-in-windows-forms.md)。For more information on messaging, see [User Input in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/user-input-in-windows-forms.md). 与 Visual Basic 6.0 中，不同未调用方法。Unlike Visual Basic 6.0, the method does not call the method. 通常情况下，在处理消息循环中使用此方法。Typically, you use this method in a loop to process messages. > [!CAUTION] > 调用此方法会导致在处理所有等待窗口消息时要挂起当前线程。Calling this method causes the current thread to be suspended while all waiting window messages are processed. 如果消息导致要触发的事件，可能执行应用程序代码的其他方面。If a message causes an event to be triggered, then other areas of your application code may execute. 这会导致你的应用程序来展示难以调试的意外的行为。This can cause your application to exhibit unexpected behaviors that are difficult to debug. 通常，如果你执行的操作或需要较长时间的计算，则更可取的方法执行新线程上的那些操作。If you perform operations or computations that take a long time, it is often preferable to perform those operations on a new thread. 有关异步编程的详细信息，请参阅[异步编程模型 (APM)](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md)。For more information about asynchronous programming, see [Asynchronous Programming Model (APM)](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates using the method. 该示例运行时，用户可选择从图形文件。When the example runs, a user can select graphics files from an . 所选的文件将显示在窗体中。The selected files are displayed in the form. 方法会强行重绘的每个图形文件在打开的窗体。The method forces a repaint of the form for each graphics file opened. 若要运行此示例中，粘贴以下代码中一个窗体包含名为`PictureBox1`、名为`OpenFileDialog1`，和一个名为的按钮`fileButton`。To run this example, paste the following code in a form containing a named `PictureBox1`, an named `OpenFileDialog1`, and a button named `fileButton`. 调用`InitializePictureBox`和`InitializeOpenFileDialog`从窗体的构造函数的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InitializePictureBox` and `InitializeOpenFileDialog` methods from the form's constructor or `Load` method. > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Studio 中，如果你添加到窗体中通过拖动操作，则将需要修改以下`InitializeOpenFileDialog`通过删除创建的新实例的行的方法。In Visual Studio, if you add an to your form by using a drag operation, you will have to modify the following `InitializeOpenFileDialog` method by removing the line that creates a new instance of . 该示例还要求事件控件和事件连接到示例中定义的事件处理程序。The example also requires that the event of the control and the event of the are connected to the event handlers defined in the example. 当运行示例时，显示对话框中单击的按钮。When the example is running, display the dialog box by clicking the button. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/CPP/filedialogform.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/CS/filedialogform.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/VB/filedialogform.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void EnableVisualStyles() cil managed

summary.span: 启用应用程序的可视样式。

span.span: Enables visual styles for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使应用程序的可视样式。This method enables visual styles for the application. 了可视样式的颜色、 字体和窗体操作系统主题其他可视元素。Visual styles are the colors, fonts, and other visual elements that form an operating system theme. 如果控件和操作系统支持，将以视觉样式绘制控件。Controls will draw with visual styles if the control and the operating system support it. 产生任何影响，必须在创建应用程序; 中的任何控件之前调用通常情况下，是中的第一个行`Main`函数。To have an effect, must be called before creating any controls in the application; typically, is the first line in the `Main` function. 启用视觉样式，在调用时不需要单独清单。A separate manifest is not required to enable visual styles when calling . > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 2.0 中之前,`FlatStyle`的某些控件，例如派生的控件的属性，必须设置为顺序以视觉样式绘制的控件。Prior to the .NET Framework 2.0, the `FlatStyle` property of some controls, such as controls that derive from , had to be set to in order for the controls to be drawn with visual styles. 在使用.NET Framework 2.0 编写的应用程序，这是不再有必要。In applications written with the .NET Framework 2.0, this is no longer necessary. > [!NOTE] > 此方法不起作用的 Internet Explorer 中承载的控件。This method will have no effect for controls hosted in Internet Explorer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用中`Main`函数，以使应用程序的可视样式。The following code example demonstrates calling in the `Main` function to enable visual styles for the application. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Occurs when the application is about to enter a modal state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 由于这是一个静态事件，则必须在你的应用程序将被释放，或会导致内存泄漏时分离事件处理程序。Because this is a static event, you must detach your event handlers when your application is disposed, or memory leaks will result. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 要运行此代码示例，将其粘贴到 Windows 窗体，并确保与事件处理程序事件。To run the example code, paste it into a Windows Forms and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#3)]

取决于是否使用 [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 部署 Windows 窗体应用程序，此路径将会不同。This path will be different depending on whether the Windows Forms application is deployed using [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]. [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 应用程序存储在每个用户应用程序缓存中 C:\Documents and Settings\\*用户名*目录。 applications are stored in a per-user application cache in the C:\Documents and Settings\\*username* directory. 有关详细信息，请参阅[访问本地数据和 ClickOnce 应用程序中的远程数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be5cbe12-6cb6-49c9-aa59-a1624e1eef3d)。For more information, see [Accessing Local and Remote Data in ClickOnce Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be5cbe12-6cb6-49c9-aa59-a1624e1eef3d).

span.span: for getting the path.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Exit() cil managed

summary.span: 通知所有消息泵必须终止，并且在处理了消息以后关闭所有应用程序窗口。

span.span: Informs all message pumps that they must terminate, and then closes all application windows after the messages have been processed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法所有线程上停止所有正在运行消息循环，并关闭应用程序的所有窗口。The method stops all running message loops on all threads and closes all windows of the application. 此方法不一定强制退出该应用程序。This method does not necessarily force the application to exit. 方法通常从调用中使用消息循环，并强制返回。The method is typically called from within a message loop, and forces to return. 若要退出当前线程的消息循环，请调用。To exit a message loop for the current thread only, call . 可引发以下事件并执行关联的条件操作： raises the following events and performs the associated conditional actions: - A为表示由每个窗体中引发事件属性。A event is raised for every form represented by the property. 此事件可取消通过设置属性其参数`true`。This event can be canceled by setting the property of their parameter to `true`. - 如果一个或多个处理程序将取消该事件，然后返回而无需进一步操作。If one of more of the handlers cancels the event, then returns without further action. 否则为对于每个打开的窗体，将引发事件，然后关闭所有正在运行的消息循环和窗体。Otherwise, a event is raised for every open form, then all running message loops and forms are closed. > [!NOTE] > 方法不会引发和起已过时的事件[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]。The method does not raise the and events, which are obsolete as of [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的代码示例列出窗体上一个列表框中的数字。The following code example lists numbers in a list box on a form. 每次你单击`button1`，应用程序列表中添加另一个数。Each time you click `button1`, the application adds another number to the list. `Main`方法调用启动该应用程序，这将创建窗体， `listBox1`，和`button1`。The `Main` method calls to start the application, which creates the form, `listBox1`, and `button1`. 当用户单击`button1`、`button1_Click`方法添加到列表框中，一到三个数字并显示。When the user clicks `button1`, the `button1_Click` method adds numbers one to three to the list box, and displays a . 如果用户单击**否**上、`button1_Click`方法向列表添加另一个数。If the user clicks **No** on the , the `button1_Click` method adds another number to the list. 如果用户单击**是**，应用程序调用，来处理队列中的所有剩余消息，然后退出。If the user clicks **Yes**, the application calls , to process all remaining messages in the queue and then to quit. 该示例需要`listBox1`和`button1`已实例化并已放置在窗体上。The example requires that `listBox1` and `button1` have been instantiated and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic Application.Exit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application.Exit Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Application.Exit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application.Exit Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Application.Exit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application.Exit Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法退出当前线程的消息循环。Use this method to exit the message loop of the current thread. 此方法会导致调用当前线程在可以返回。This method causes the call to for the current thread to return. 若要退出整个应用程序，请调用。To exit the entire application, call .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event Idle As EventHandler

summary.span: 当应用程序完成处理并即将进入空闲状态时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the application finishes processing and is about to enter the idle state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你有必须执行的任务的线程进入空闲状态之前，将它们附加到此事件。If you have tasks that you must perform before the thread becomes idle, attach them to this event. > [!CAUTION] > 由于这是一个静态事件，则必须在你的应用程序将被释放，或会导致内存泄漏时分离事件处理程序。Because this is a static event, you must detach your event handlers when your application is disposed, or memory leaks will result. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，将其粘贴到 Windows 窗体，并确保该事件处理程序与关联事件。To run the example code, paste it into a Windows Form and make sure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 由于这是一个静态事件，则必须在你的应用程序将被释放，或会导致内存泄漏时分离事件处理程序。Because this is a static event, you must detach your event handlers when your application is disposed, or memory leaks will result. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 要运行此代码示例，将其粘贴到 Windows 窗体，并确保与事件处理程序事件。To run the example code, paste it into a Windows Forms and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property LocalUserAppDataPath As String
public: static property System::String ^ LocalUserAppDataPath { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取本地、非漫游用户的应用程序数据的路径。

span.span: Gets the path for the application data of a local, non-roaming user.

value.span: 本地、非漫游用户的应用程序数据的路径。

span.span: The path for the application data of a local, non-roaming user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本地用户是指其用户配置文件存储在用户登录的系统上。A local user is one whose user profile is stored on the system on which the user logged on. 如果路径不存在，将创建一个采用以下格式：If a path does not exist, one is created in the following format: *基路径*\\\\\\*Base Path*\\\\\\ 典型的基路径是 C:\Documents and Settings\\*用户名*settings\application Data。A typical base path is C:\Documents and Settings\\*username*\Local Settings\Application Data. 此路径将会不同，但是，如果通过使用部署 Windows 窗体应用程序[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]。This path will be different, however, if the Windows Forms application is deployed by using [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]. [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 创建其自己独立于所有其他应用程序的应用程序数据目录。 creates its own application data directory that is isolated from all other applications. 有关详细信息，请参阅[访问本地数据和 ClickOnce 应用程序中的远程数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be5cbe12-6cb6-49c9-aa59-a1624e1eef3d)。For more information, see [Accessing Local and Remote Data in ClickOnce Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be5cbe12-6cb6-49c9-aa59-a1624e1eef3d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示两个窗体，并退出应用程序，这两个窗体关闭时。The following code example displays two forms and exits the application when both forms are closed. 当应用程序启动和退出时，将记住每个窗体的位置。When the application starts and exits, the position of each form is remembered. 虽然此示例演示如何使用属性来存储应用程序数据的用户，可以改为使用。Although this example demonstrates using the property to store application data for the user, the can be used instead. `MyApplicationContext`类继承自每个窗体已关闭，并在它们都时退出当前线程时保持跟踪。The `MyApplicationContext` class inherits from and keeps track when each form is closed, and exits the current thread when they both are. 该类存储了用户的每个窗体的位置。The class stores the positions of each form for the user. 窗体位置数据存储在文件标题为`Appdata.txt`，它在由位置创建。The form position data is stored in a file titled `Appdata.txt` that is created in the location determined by . `Main`方法调用`Application.Run(context)`启动应用程序提供。The `Main` method calls `Application.Run(context)` to start the application given the . 此代码摘自中所示的示例类概述。This code is an excerpt from the example shown in the class overview. 为了简洁起见，不显示某些代码。Some code is not shown for the purpose of brevity. 请参阅为完整的代码清单。See for the whole code listing. [!code-cpp[Application#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Application/CPP/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[Application#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Application/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Application#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Application/VB/source.vb#5)]

summary.span: 获取指示该线程上是否存在消息循环的值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性在其他环境，如非托管应用程序中承载 Windows 窗体时将始终返回`false`。When hosting Windows Forms in other environments, such as unmanaged applications, this property will always return `false`. 使用以指示 Windows 窗体的宿主环境如果仍有活动的消息循环。Use to instruct Windows Forms if the hosting environment still has an active message loop.

summary.span: 初始化当前线程上的 OLE。

One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在调用任何之前调用此方法`Microsoft.Win32`需要 OLE 的方法。Call this method before calling any `Microsoft.Win32` method that requires OLE. 首先检查是否已在当前线程上初始化 OLE。 first checks to see if OLE has been initialized on the current thread. 如果没有，则初始化线程的 OLE。If not, it initializes the thread for OLE. > [!NOTE] > 除非线程直接调用 OLE 方法，你不需要调用此方法。Unless a thread calls OLE methods directly, you do not need to call this method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void OnThreadException(class System.Exception t) cil managed
Public Shared Sub OnThreadException (t As Exception)

param.name: t
param.span: 一个 ，它代表所引发的异常。

span.span: An that represents the exception that was thrown.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用以引发异常，处理的应用程序，则将暂停。Call to raise an exception that will halt processing of the application. 类具有事件。The class has a event. 可以将事件处理程序附加到此事件来执行的未处理异常所需的任何自定义处理。You can attach an event handler to this event to do whatever custom processing you need for unhandled exceptions. 如果你不会附加一个事件处理程序即将执行默认行为，其中包括显示一个对话框，通知用户已被错误。If you do not attach an event handler, will execute the default behavior, which involves displaying a dialog box to inform the user that there has been an error. 仅在线程拥有的 Windows 窗体上实现默认的发生的未经处理异常的异常行为。 only implements default exception behavior for unhandled exceptions that occur on threads owned by Windows Forms. 由其他线程上未经处理的异常处理事件。Unhandled exceptions on other threads are handled by the event.

span.span: Gets the product name associated with this application.
The product name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ProductName` 将取自于包含当前应用程序的主窗体的程序集的元数据。`ProductName` is taken from the metadata of the assembly containing the main form of the current application. 你可以将其设置通过设置内程序集清单。You can set it by setting inside of your assembly manifest. 有关详细信息，请参阅[程序集清单](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-manifest.md)。For more information, see [Assembly Manifest](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-manifest.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取此属性，并在文本框中显示其值。The following code example gets this property and displays its value in a text box. 该示例需要`textBox1`已放在窗体上。The example requires that `textBox1` has been placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic Application.ProductName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application.ProductName Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Application.ProductName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application.ProductName Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Application.ProductName Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application.ProductName Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取与该应用程序关联的产品版本。

span.span: Gets the product version associated with this application.
The product version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，版本号将显示为*主要数*。*版本号*。*内部版本号*。*专用部件号*。Typically, a version number displays as *major number*.*minor number*.*build number*.*private part number*. 通过设置你的程序集清单中的程序集版本可以显式将其设置。You can set it explicitly by setting the assembly version within your assembly manifest. 有关详细信息，请参阅[程序集清单](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-manifest.md)。For more information, see [Assembly Manifest](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-manifest.md). 第一个如下所示，以查看是否有包含主可执行文件的程序集`AssemblyInformationalVersion`在其上的属性。 first looks to see if the assembly containing the main executable has the `AssemblyInformationalVersion` attribute on it. 如果存在此属性，它同时用于和。If this attribute exists, it is used for both and . 如果此属性不存在，这两个属性使用的可执行文件的版本。If this attribute does not exist, both properties use the version of the executable file instead. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取此属性，并在文本框中显示其值。The following code example gets this property and displays its value in a text box. 该示例需要`textBox1`已放在窗体上。The example requires that `textBox1` has been placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic Application.ProductVersion Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application.ProductVersion Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Application.ProductVersion Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application.ProductVersion Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Application.ProductVersion Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application.ProductVersion Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在另一个环境，如非托管应用程序中承载 Windows 窗体时使用此方法。This method is used when hosting Windows Forms in another environment, such as an unmanaged application. 应调用在宿主应用程序进入空闲状态。You should call when the hosting application enters an idle state. 这样，某些 Windows 窗体控件和组件进行重要后台工作时用户未与应用程序交互。This enables some Windows Forms controls and components to do important background work while the user is not interacting with the application.

param.name: callback
param.span: 当 Windows 窗体需要检查宿主环境是否仍在发送消息时，所要调用的方法。

summary.span: 注册一个回调以检查消息循环是否正在宿主环境中运行。

span.span: Registers a callback for checking whether the message loop is running in hosted environments.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在另一个环境，如非托管应用程序中承载 Windows 窗体时使用此方法。This method is used when hosting Windows Forms in another environment, such as an unmanaged application. 在托管环境中，属性将始终返回 false，如果 Windows 窗体不处理消息。In hosted environments, the property will always return false if Windows Forms is not processing messages. 使用此回调来告诉 Windows 窗体的宿主环境仍在处理消息。Use this callback to tell Windows Forms if the hosting environment is still processing messages.

span.span: Removes a message filter from the message pump of the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你不再想要捕获 Windows 消息之前被发送时，你可以删除消息筛选器。You can remove a message filter when you no longer want to capture Windows messages before they are dispatched. ## Examples 你可以使用消息筛选器之前，必须提供的实现接口。Before you can use a message filter, you must provide an implementation for the interface. 下面的类创建消息筛选器调用`TestMessageFilter`。The following class creates a message filter called `TestMessageFilter`. 此筛选器会阻止与鼠标左键相关的所有消息。This filter blocks all messages relating to the left mouse button. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您正在绘制的自定义控件，则使用此属性来确定是否要绘制控件带或不带可视样式，以使其外观与应用程序中其他控件一致。If you are drawing a custom control, use this property to decide whether to draw the control with or without visual styles, so that its appearance is consistent with other controls in the application. 下表显示的四个条件必须存在的返回`true`。The following table shows the four conditions that must exist for to return `true`. |条件Condition|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |操作系统支持视觉样式The operating system supports visual styles|若要单独验证这种情况，请使用 类的 属性。To verify this condition separately, use the property of the class.| |用户已启用在操作系统中的视觉样式The user has enabled visual styles in the operating system|若要单独验证这种情况，请使用 类的 属性。To verify this condition separately, use the property of the class.| |应用程序中启用了可视样式Visual styles are enabled in the application|可以通过调用 方法或使用指定用 ComCtl32.dll 版本 6 或更高版本绘制控件的应用程序清单来启用应用程序中的视觉样式。Visual styles can be enabled in an application by calling the method or by using an application manifest that specifies that ComCtl32.dll version 6 or later will be used to draw controls.| |正在使用可视样式绘制应用程序窗口的工作区Visual styles are being used to draw the client area of application windows|若要单独验证这种情况，请使用 类的 属性，验证它是否具有 或 值。To verify this condition separately, use the property of the class and verify that it has the value or .|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Restart() cil managed

summary.span: 关闭应用程序并立即启动一个新实例。

span.span: Shuts down the application and starts a new instance immediately.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用的最常见原因`Restart`是启动新版本的应用程序已通过下载[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]使用`Update`或`UpdateAsync`方法。The most common reason for calling `Restart` is to start a new version of the application that you have downloaded through [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] using the `Update` or `UpdateAsync` method. 应用程序将重新启动它们首次运行所在的上下文中。Applications are restarted in the context in which they were initially run. 如果你的应用程序已开始使用直接指向应用程序的主可执行文件的 URL，它将重新启动使用相同的 URL。If your application was started using a URL pointing directly to the application's main executable file, it will be restarted using the same URL. 如果你的应用程序[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]应用程序中，它将重新启动使用[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]。If your application is a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application, it will be restarted using [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]. 如果你的应用程序时它第一次执行了最初提供的命令行选项将启动应用程序再次使用相同的选项。If your application was originally supplied command-line options when it first executed, will launch the application again with the same options.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void Run() cil managed

summary.span: 在没有窗体的情况下，在当前线程上开始运行标准应用程序消息循环。

span.span: Begins running a standard application message loop on the current thread, without a form.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在基于 Win32 的或 Windows 窗体应用程序消息循环是处理用户事件，如点击鼠标和键盘键击代码中的例程。In a Win32-based or Windows Forms application, a message loop is a routine in code that processes user events, such as mouse clicks and keyboard strokes. 每个正在运行的基于 Windows 的应用程序需要调用主消息循环活动的消息循环。Every running Windows-based application requires an active message loop, called the main message loop. 当关闭主消息循环时，应用程序退出。When the main message loop is closed, the application exits. 在 Windows 窗体，将关闭此循环时调用方法时，或当运行主消息循环的线程上调用方法。In Windows Forms, this loop is closed when the method is called, or when the method is called on the thread that is running the main message loop. 大多数 Windows 窗体开发人员将不需要使用此版本的方法。Most Windows Forms developers will not need to use this version of the method. 应使用重载，以使用主窗体中，启动应用程序，以便在应用程序终止时关闭主窗体。You should use the overload to start an application with a main form, so that the application terminates when the main form is closed. 对于所有其他情况下，使用重载，该产品支持提供更好地控制应用程序的生存期的对象。For all other situations, use the overload, which supports supplying an object for better control over the lifetime of the application.

exception.span: 主消息循环已在此线程上运行。

span.span: A main message loop is already running on this thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息循环运行，直到或称为或上下文对象上引发事件。The message loop runs until or is called or the event is raised on the context object. ## Examples 此示例显示两个窗体，并退出应用程序，这两个窗体关闭时。The example displays two forms and exits the application when both forms are closed. 当应用程序启动和退出时，将记住每个窗体的位置。When the application starts and exits, the position of each form is remembered. 此示例演示如何使用，连同`Application.Run(context)`方法，以显示多个窗体应用程序启动时。This example demonstrates how to use an , along with the `Application.Run(context)` method, to display multiple forms when the application starts. 类`MyApplicationContext`继承自每个窗体已关闭，并在它们都时退出当前线程时保持跟踪。The class `MyApplicationContext` inherits from and keeps track when each form is closed, and exits the current thread when they both are. 该类存储了用户的每个窗体的位置。The class stores the positions of each form for the user. 窗体位置数据存储在文件标题为`Appdata.txt`，它在由位置创建。The form position data is stored in a file titled `Appdata.txt` that is created in the location determined by . `Main`方法调用`Application.Run(context)`启动应用程序提供。The `Main` method calls `Application.Run(context)` to start the application given the . 代码`AppForm1`和`AppForm2`起见不显示窗体。The code for the `AppForm1` and `AppForm2` forms is not shown for the purpose of brevity. 请参阅类概述为完整的代码清单。See the class overview for the whole code listing. remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，应用程序的主函数调用此方法，并将应用程序的主窗口传递给它。Typically, the main function of an application calls this method and passes to it the main window of the application. 此方法将添加到事件处理程序`mainForm`参数事件。This method adds an event handler to the `mainForm` parameter for the event. 事件处理程序调用清理应用程序。The event handler calls to clean up the application. > [!NOTE] > 方法类将在此方法返回之前调用。The method of the class will be called prior to the return of this method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例列出窗体上一个列表框中的数字。The following code example lists numbers in a list box on a form. 每次你单击`button1`，应用程序列表中添加另一个数。Each time you click `button1`, the application adds another number to the list. `Main`方法调用启动该应用程序，这将创建窗体， `listBox1`，和`button1`。The `Main` method calls to start the application, which creates the form, `listBox1`, and `button1`. 当用户单击`button1`、`button1_Click`方法添加到列表框中，一到三个数字并显示。When the user clicks `button1`, the `button1_Click` method adds numbers one to three to the list box, and displays a . 如果用户单击**否**上、`button1_Click`方法向列表添加另一个数。If the user clicks **No** on the , the `button1_Click` method adds another number to the list. 如果用户单击**是**，应用程序调用来处理队列中的所有剩余消息，然后退出。If the user clicks **Yes**, the application calls to process all remaining messages in the queue and then to quit. 该示例需要`listBox1`和`button1`已创建并已放置在窗体上。The example requires that `listBox1` and `button1` have been created and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic Application.Exit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application.Exit Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Application.Exit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application.Exit Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Application.Exit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application.Exit Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果应用程序不响应的挂起请求在 20 秒内，Windows 将确定它处于非响应状态，并且，应用程序可以被置于休眠模式或终止。If an application does not respond to a suspend request within 20 seconds, Windows determines that it is in a non-responsive state, and that the application can either be put to sleep or terminated. 一旦应用程序响应的挂起请求，但是，它可能需要它需要清理资源，并关闭活动进程的任意时间。Once an application responds to a suspend request, however, it can take whatever time it needs to clean up resources and shut down active processes.

summary.span: 指示应用程序如何响应未经处理的异常。

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置 Windows 窗体线程和其他线程发生的异常的异常发生的事件处理程序。The following code example sets event handlers for exceptions that occur on Windows Forms threads and exceptions that occur on other threads. 它将设置以便所有异常都处理应用程序，而不考虑应用程序的用户配置文件中的设置。It sets so that all exceptions are handled by the application, regardless of the settings in the application's user configuration file. 它使用事件来处理 UI 线程异常和事件来处理非 UI 线程异常。It uses the event to handle UI thread exceptions, and the event to handle non-UI thread exceptions. 由于无法防止应用程序终止，则只需将错误记录中在终止之前应用程序事件日志。Since cannot prevent an application from terminating, the example simply logs the error in the application event log before termination. 此示例假定你已经定义了两个控件，`button1`和`button2`，在你类。This example assumes that you have defined two controls, `button1` and `button2`, on your class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 它通常不是可行捕捉所有由 Windows 窗体引发的异常。It is often not feasible to catch all of the exceptions thrown by Windows Forms. 使用此方法，你可以指示是否应捕获所有未经处理由 Windows 窗体组件引发的异常并继续运行，或它是否应将它们公开给用户并暂停执行你的应用程序。Using this method, you can instruct your application whether it should catch all unhandled exceptions thrown by Windows Forms components and continue operating, or whether it should expose them to the user and halt execution. 调用实例化你的应用程序使用的主窗体之前方法。Call before you instantiate the main form of your application using the method. 若要捕获不创建的线程中出现的异常和由 Windows 窗体，拥有使用事件处理程序。To catch exceptions that occur in threads not created and owned by Windows Forms, use the event handler. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置 Windows 窗体线程和其他线程发生的异常的异常发生的事件处理程序。The following code example sets event handlers for exceptions that occur on Windows Forms threads and exceptions that occur on other threads. 它将设置以便所有异常都处理应用程序，而不考虑应用程序的用户配置文件中的设置。It sets so that all exceptions are handled by the application, regardless of the settings in the application's user configuration file. 它使用事件来处理 UI 线程异常和事件来处理非 UI 线程异常。It uses the event to handle UI thread exceptions, and the event to handle non-UI thread exceptions. 由于无法防止应用程序终止，则只需将错误记录中在终止之前应用程序事件日志。Since cannot prevent an application from terminating, the example simply logs the error in the application event log before termination. 此示例假定你已经定义了两个控件，`button1`和`button2`，在你类。This example assumes that you have defined two controls, `button1` and `button2`, on your class. Examples 下面的代码示例设置 Windows 窗体线程和其他线程发生的异常的异常发生的事件处理程序。The following code example sets event handlers for exceptions that occur on Windows Forms threads and exceptions that occur on other threads. 它将设置以便所有异常都处理应用程序，而不考虑应用程序的用户配置文件中的设置。It sets so that all exceptions are handled by the application, regardless of the settings in the application's user configuration file. 它使用事件来处理 UI 线程异常和事件来处理非 UI 线程异常。It uses the event to handle UI thread exceptions, and the event to handle non-UI thread exceptions. 由于无法防止应用程序终止，则只需将错误记录中在终止之前应用程序事件日志。Since cannot prevent an application from terminating, the example simply logs the error in the application event log before termination. 此示例假定你已经定义了两个控件，`button1`和`button2`，在你类。This example assumes that you have defined two controls, `button1` and `button2`, on your class. [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 应用程序存储在每个用户应用程序缓存中 C:\Documents and Settings\\*用户名*目录。 applications are stored in a per-user application cache in the C:\Documents and Settings\\*username* directory. 有关详细信息，请参阅[访问本地数据和 ClickOnce 应用程序中的远程数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be5cbe12-6cb6-49c9-aa59-a1624e1eef3d)。For more information, see [Accessing Local and Remote Data in ClickOnce Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be5cbe12-6cb6-49c9-aa59-a1624e1eef3d).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event ThreadException As ThreadExceptionEventHandler

summary.span: 在发生未捕获线程异常时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an untrapped thread exception is thrown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件允许 Windows 窗体应用程序与 Windows 窗体线程中发生的句柄否则为未经处理的异常。This event allows your Windows Forms application to handle otherwise unhandled exceptions that occur in Windows Forms threads. 附加到事件处理程序事件来处理这些例外情况，这将使你的应用程序处于未知状态。Attach your event handlers to the event to deal with these exceptions, which will leave your application in an unknown state. 如果可能，应由结构化异常处理块处理异常。Where possible, exceptions should be handled by a structured exception handling block. 你可以更改是否通过设置情况下，使用 Windows 窗体线程的未处理异常的此回调。You can change whether this callback is used for unhandled Windows Forms thread exceptions by setting . 若要捕获不创建的线程中出现的异常和由 Windows 窗体，拥有使用事件处理程序。To catch exceptions that occur in threads not created and owned by Windows Forms, use the event handler. > [!NOTE] > 若要确保此事件没有激活会丢失，必须附加处理程序，然后才能调用。To guarantee that no activations of this event are missed, you must attach a handler before you call . > [!CAUTION] > 由于这是一个静态事件，则必须在你的应用程序将被释放，或会导致内存泄漏时分离事件处理程序。Because this is a static event, you must detach your event handlers when your application is disposed, or memory leaks will result. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置 Windows 窗体线程和其他线程发生的异常的异常发生的事件处理程序。The following code example sets event handlers for exceptions that occur on Windows Forms threads and exceptions that occur on other threads. 它将设置以便所有异常都处理应用程序，而不考虑应用程序的用户配置文件中的设置。It sets so that all exceptions are handled by the application, regardless of the settings in the application's user configuration file. 它使用事件来处理 UI 线程异常和事件来处理非 UI 线程异常。It uses the event to handle UI thread exceptions, and the event to handle non-UI thread exceptions. 由于无法防止应用程序终止，则只需将错误记录中在终止之前应用程序事件日志。Since cannot prevent an application from terminating, the example simply logs the error in the application event log before termination. 此示例假定你已经定义了两个控件，`button1`和`button2`，在你类。This example assumes that you have defined two controls, `button1` and `button2`, on your class. [!code-cpp[Classic Application.ThreadException Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application.ThreadException Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Application.ThreadException Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application.ThreadException Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Application.ThreadException Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application.ThreadException Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

permission.span: 直接调用方调用非托管的代码时此事件添加处理程序。

summary.span: 在某线程即将关闭时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a thread is about to shut down.

summary.span: 当应用程序的主线程即将关闭时，首先引发该事件，随后是 事件。

span.span: When the main thread for an application is about to be shut down, this event is raised first, followed by an event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须将附加到的事件处理程序事件以执行任何未处理的、 所需任务的线程停止运行前。You must attach the event handlers to the event to perform any unhandled, required tasks before the thread stops running. 关闭打开的此线程或释放的垃圾回收器未回收的对象文件。Close files opened by this thread, or dispose of objects that the garbage collector did not reclaim. > [!CAUTION] > 由于这是一个静态事件，则必须在你的应用程序将被释放，或会导致内存泄漏时分离事件处理程序。Because this is a static event, you must detach your event handlers when your application is disposed, or memory leaks will result. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 要运行此代码示例，将其粘贴到 Windows 窗体，并确保与事件处理程序事件。To run the example code, paste it into a Windows Forms and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property UserAppDataPath As String

summary.span: 获取用户的应用程序数据的路径。

span.span: Gets the path for the application data of a user.

value.span: 用户的应用程序数据的路径。

span.span: The path for the application data of a user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果路径不存在，将创建一个采用以下格式：If a path does not exist, one is created in the following format: *基路径*\\\\\\*Base Path*\\\\\\ 此路径中存储的数据是启用的漫游用户配置文件的一部分。Data stored in this path is part of user profile that is enabled for roaming. 漫游用户在网络中的多个计算机上工作。A roaming user works on more than one computer in a network. 漫游用户的用户配置文件保留在网络上的服务器上，并在用户登录时加载到系统。The user profile for a roaming user is kept on a server on the network and is loaded onto a system when the user logs on. 用户配置文件才会考虑让漫游时，操作系统必须支持漫游配置文件，并且必须启用。For a user profile to be considered for roaming, the operating system must support roaming profiles and it must be enabled. 典型的基路径是 C:\Documents and Settings\\*用户名*\Application 数据。A typical base path is C:\Documents and Settings\\*username*\Application Data. 此路径将会不同，但是，如果通过使用部署 Windows 窗体应用程序[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]。This path will be different, however, if the Windows Forms application is deployed by using [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]. [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 创建其自己独立于所有其他应用程序的应用程序数据目录。 creates its own application data directory that is isolated from all other applications. 有关详细信息，请参阅[访问本地数据和 ClickOnce 应用程序中的远程数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be5cbe12-6cb6-49c9-aa59-a1624e1eef3d)。For more information, see [Accessing Local and Remote Data in ClickOnce Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be5cbe12-6cb6-49c9-aa59-a1624e1eef3d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示两个窗体，并退出应用程序，这两个窗体关闭时。The following code example displays two forms and exits the application when both forms are closed. 当应用程序启动和退出时，将记住每个窗体的位置。When the application starts and exits, the position of each form is remembered. 此示例演示如何使用属性来存储用户的应用程序数据。This example demonstrates using the property to store application data for the user. 类`MyApplicationContext`继承自每个窗体已关闭，并在它们都时退出当前线程时保持跟踪。The class `MyApplicationContext` inherits from and keeps track when each form is closed, and exits the current thread when they both are. 该类存储了用户的每个窗体的位置。The class stores the positions of each form for the user. 窗体位置数据存储在文件标题为`Appdata.txt`，它在由位置创建。The form position data is stored in a file titled `Appdata.txt` that is created in the location determined by . `Main`方法调用`Application.Run(context)`启动应用程序提供。The `Main` method calls `Application.Run(context)` to start the application given the . 此代码摘自中所示的示例类概述。This code is an excerpt from the example shown in the class overview. 为了简洁起见，不显示某些代码。Some code is not shown for the purpose of brevity. 请参阅为完整的代码清单。See for the whole code listing. [!code-cpp[Application#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Application/CPP/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[Application#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Application/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Application#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Application/VB/source.vb#5)]

value.span: 一个 ，它表示特定于用户的应用程序数据的注册表项。

span.span: A representing the registry key for the application data specific to the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不存在该键，则将它创建采用以下格式：If the key does not exist, it is created in the following format: CurrentUser\Software\\\\\\CurrentUser\Software\\\\\\ 数据存储在此项是启用的漫游用户配置文件的一部分。Data stored in this key is part of user profile that is enabled for roaming. 漫游用户在网络中的多个计算机上工作。A roaming user works on more than one computer in a network. 漫游用户的用户配置文件保留在网络上的服务器上，并在用户登录时加载到系统。The user profile for a roaming user is kept on a server on the network and is loaded onto a system when the user logs on. 用户配置文件才会考虑让漫游时，操作系统必须支持漫游配置文件，并且必须启用。For a user profile to be considered for roaming, the operating system must support roaming profiles and it must be enabled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为`true`、的应用程序中的所有打开窗体的属性将设置为`true`。When this property is set to `true`, the property of all open forms in the application will be set to `true`. 此属性将设置在所有窗体上之前，不会返回此调用。This call will not return until this property has been set on all forms. 当你有一个长时间运行的操作，并想要在所有应用程序窗体中指示该操作仍在处理时，请使用此属性。Use this property when you have a long-running operation, and want to indicate in all application forms that the operation is still processing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这属性确定在客户端区域或应用程序窗口非工作区中是否启用了可视样式。This property determines whether visual styles are enabled in client areas or nonclient areas of application windows. 通常情况下，应在主窗体的构造函数中设置此属性或事件处理程序。Generally, this property should be set within the main form's constructor or event handler. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性之一值内事件处理程序控件。The following code example sets the property to one of the values within the event handler for a control. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供枚举。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the enumeration.
